text: All Saints DLR station is a station on the Docklands Light Railway (DLR) in East London. It is named after the neaby All Saints, Poplar, a church dating from 1821-3. The station entrance is on the East India Dock Road, opposite Chrisp Street Market. == References == * Listed as All Saints LRT station * == Other websites == * Docklands Light Railway website - All Saints station page * Map of Poplar, 1885. * Photograph of the platform at All Saints Category:London Travelcard zone 2 Category:Docklands Light Railway stations Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets
title: All Saints DLR station
